org_service_description: Services include emergency food boxes, hot lunch four days a week (Mon, Tue, Wed, and Thu 11:30 am-12:30), thrift store, utility assistance when funding is available for Dyer County residents in need, and School Uniform Program for Dyer County students.
org_intake_procedure: Call to apply for assistance or walk in.
org_hours: Administrative Offices Hours: Mon 9:00 am - 4:00 pm Tues - Friday 8:00 am to 4:00 pm Thrift Store hours: Mon - Sat 9:00 am - 5:00 pm (store open to all) Soup Kitchen Hours - Breakfast: Monday-Friday 7:30-9:00am and Saturday 8:30-9:30am Lunch: Monday-Friday 11:30-1:00pm

org_service_description: RIFA provides monthly household food assistance as well as a soup kitchen open seven days a week. RIFA serves residents of Madison County. We also may be able to assist with other needs such as clothing vouchers for our thrift store as well as hygiene supplies.
org_eligibility: Residents of Madison County who are in need
org_intake_procedure: Call or walk-in for more information; will do financial assessment to determine eligibility for some services The soup kitchen is no questions asked or documents required
org_hours: Sunday closed | Monday 9:00AM-4:00PM | Tuesday 8:00AM-4:00PM | Wednesday 8:00AM-4:00PM | Thursday 8:00AM-4:00PM | Friday 8:00AM-4:00PM | Saturday closed
